name: Westwalker Campfire
description: A small, well-kept campfire crackles, a lonely point of light against the vast, darkening plains of the Frontier. The edge of the Griefwood looms like a wall of shadow in the distance. The air carries an unusual chill.

rest.description: Rest and recover by the warm campfire

exploration.description: The frontier wilderness offers many opportunities for the resourceful traveler.
scout_discoveries: You spot fresh water nearby that's safe to drink.
You notice animal trails leading to good hunting grounds.
You identify a sheltered spot perfect for camping.
You see smoke rising from Westhaven in the distance.

lore-data.description: A resting spot for travelers on the edge of the Griefwood.
